code: @Test public void testBeanToBean() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:person").expectedMessageCount(1).     getMockEndpoint("mock:person").message(0).body().isInstanceOf(PersonType.class).     template.sendBody("direct:start", null).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:start").bean(MyPersonService.class, "createPerson").bean(MyPersonService.class, "sendPerson").         }     }. }
